amendment.description: To provide the Director of the National Institutes of Health with the authority to carry out the NIH Roadmap to provide for rapid advances in the biomedical research process.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1649 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1649 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Stevens to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11426-11427; text: CR S11427) To provide the Director of the National Institutes of Health with the authority to carry out the NIH Roadmap to provide for rapid advances in the biomedical research process.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1649 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Stevens to Amendment SA 1542.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1649 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
